original_text: And when it was disclosed to me that there would be a plot against the man, I sent him to you at once, ordering his accusers also to state before you what they have against him.”
korean_text: 그러나 이 사람을 해하려는 간계가 있다고 누가 내게 알려 주기로 곧 당신께로 보내며 또 고발하는 사람들도 당신 앞에서 그에 대하여 말하라 하였나이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when it was disclosed to me
that there would be a plot against the man
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람을 해할 음모가 있을 것이라는 것이

sentences.original_text: I sent him to you at once
